p.s: I think the quote of Ludwig Wittgenstein isn't true.
He saissays that the limits of his language are the limits of his world.
But if you think like this you can't get out of your country and experience something new, because you don't understand the spoken language in another part of the world.
You have to learn another language if you want to do a year abroad for example.
And we aren't limetedlimited speaking more thenthan one language.
